Texts.Chs: 哦...现在想想真是跟做梦一样. 我能坐在使用飞船的导航控制台.
Texts.Eng: Ahh... Sweet freedom. I can use the ship's navigator from this chair.

Texts.Chs: 这艘船上最好的椅子.叶族人能坐在这打打打打开导航控制台让这艘船跑起来！
Texts.Eng: Best chair on ship. Floran can sit here to ussse navigator and fly ship!

Texts.Chs: 坐在这张船长椅上能允许我指挥这艘飞船的航向
Texts.Eng: Sitting on the Captain's chair allows me to fly this ship.

Texts.Chs: 自豪.坐在这张船长椅上能让我指挥这艘飞船的航向. 那么接下来我们要去哪？
Texts.Eng: Sitting on the Captain's chair allows me to fly this ship. Where to next?

Texts.Chs:
只有船长才有资格坐在这里指挥这艘飞船的航向
^#B8860B;可在飞船用家具定制台调整种族风格^reset;
Texts.Eng: The Captain sits here to fly the ship.

Texts.Chs: 这是船长椅.它是我的！我能坐在这打开飞船的导航控制台.
Texts.Eng: The Captain's chair. That's me! I can use the ship's navigator from this chair.

Texts.Chs: 这是船长椅.只有有资格坐在这的老大能指挥这艘船往哪儿开！但老大就是我！
Texts.Eng: The Captain's chair. The guy who sits here decides where the ship goes! That's me!

Texts.Chs: 这是船长椅.有资格坐在这张椅子上的人有权力决定这艘飞船的航向.
Texts.Eng: The Captain's chair. The person sitting here decides where the ship goes!
